article: sniper suspect lee boyd malvo pleaded innocent to murder monday and said he was ready for his trial in the slaying of an fbi analyst during last year 's three-week sniper spree in the washington suburbs .
abstract: jury selection begins for malvo sniper trial ; prosecution rests in muhammad case
